pages.title: Crafting Hanging Plants
pages.text: $(br)Want a basket of $(l)flowers hanging$() by your window?$(br2)$(#FF9900)Hanging plants$() can hook under a lamp post or chain, and they enjoy the great view from somewhere high above...
$(br2)The flowers used in above recipes can be any type, from $(#EE1111)poppies$() to $(#FFDF33)oxeye daisies$().
